fields.description:
An empty file in the s3 path.

NativeS3FsInputStream dose not check the InputStream .

fields.summary: NativeS3FileSystem throw NullPointerException when the file is empty

comments.body: looks like a duplicate of the (oustanding) HADOOP-10533.
this happens if {{store.retrieve()}} fails, and the exception is NOT converted into an IOE. At some point in the past this may have worked, but it clearly doesn't now -the failure is replicable
not a duplicate. Same stack trace, but root cause is different

HADOOP-9623 service handler changes downgrade ServiceException handling from an exception throw to a log; appears to have broken code that assumes exceptions get called on failed operations -like "seek" and "open"

... problem is that the 0.9.1 error code is now different and possibly only determinable by delving into the implementation details

{code}

HADOOP-10457 had found this, but this JIRA found it in production and has more text
was fixed in 2.5.0 via the HADOOP-9961 patch
Closing old tickets that are already part of a release.
